local_intent: Perceive the cloth, compute and align a pinch grasp on the edge, execute a retryable pick, and verify grasp stability.
assumptions: Gripper is already open and empty per global sequence
coherence_with_global: Matches global grasp phase: perception fallback, compute pinch grasp for cloth_edge into grasp_cloth_edge, align with tight tolerance, set yaw to 90, retry pick up to 2 times, then verify grasp.
